::Prowl/Annihilator/Zeus/Zardus::

Prowl grabs Annihilator's arms as the predacon swings his sword at him, 
turning around to use Annihilator's body as a shield from Blastage's shots. 
He drops the now-unconcious predacon, rolling to the left and firing an acid 
pellet at Shockwave.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zeus falls backwards as Sniper's shots hit him. He jumps into the air, 
transforming to form Dark Messias' right arm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus stumbles back as Sixshot slams a detatched arm across his face. Out of 
the corner of his optics, he sees the Oblitercons firing at Iron Raptor and 
Dinobot.

"Stop firing at them!" he yells into his comm-link to the Oblitercons, "They 
are allied with us!"

Zardus swings his sword again at Sixshot.
